author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: List all secrets engines that exist in HashiCorp Vault.
commands.name: hashicorp-list-secrets-engines

commands.description: List secrets (names) for a specified KV engine.
commands.name: hashicorp-list-secrets

commands.description: Returns information about a specified secret in a specified KV V2 engine.
commands.name: hashicorp-get-secret-metadata

commands.description: Deletes the data under a specified secret given the secret path. Performs a soft delete that allows you to run the hashicorp-undelete-secret command if necessary (for KV V2 engine).
commands.name: hashicorp-delete-secret

commands.description: Undeletes (restores) a secret on HashiCorp (for KV V2 engine).
commands.name: hashicorp-undelete-secret

commands.description: Permanently deletes a secret (for KV V2 engine).
commands.name: hashicorp-destroy-secret

commands.description: When a secrets engine is no longer needed, it can be disabled. All secrets under the engine are revoked and the corresponding vault data and configurations are removed.
commands.name: hashicorp-disable-engine

commands.description: Enables a new secrets engine at the specified path.
commands.name: hashicorp-enable-engine

commands.description: If you suspect your data has been compromised, you can seal your vault to prevent access to your secrets.
commands.name: hashicorp-seal-vault

commands.description: Use a single master key share to unseal the vault. If the master key shares threshold is met, the vault will attempt to unseal the vault. Otherwise, this API must be called until the threshold is met.
commands.name: hashicorp-unseal-vault

commands.description: Configure a secrets engine to fetch secrets from.
commands.name: hashicorp-configure-engine

integration.description: Manage Secrets and Protect Sensitive Data through HashiCorp Vault.
integration.name: HashiCorp Vault

description: Manage Secrets and Protect Sensitive Data through HashiCorp Vault
name: HashiCorp Vault
